ygData.subject: Re: Fatigue Question
ygData.msgSnippet: What level are you?  As you go up on levels, your fights become longer and longer. ... From: David Rogers  ... Ok.  I haven t had this
ygData.messageBody:
What level are you? As you go up on levels, your fights become longer and longer.

>>> David Rogers <derogers334@...> 5.26.99 11:15:44 AM >>>
From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>

--- Jason Coan <COANJ@...> wrote:
> run out of stamina your stats start to drop, which
> in turn lowers your attack and AC

Ok. I haven't had this problem yet though; my Dwarven
Paladin has a STA 95, my Troll Warrior a STA 120.
Haven't seen any difficulties in battle.

===
:D
